org.apache.hama.ml.kmeans

Class KMeansBSP

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.BSP<VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,VectorWritable,CenterMessage>
      • org.apache.hama.ml.kmeans.KMeansBSP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BSPInterface<VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,VectorWritable,CenterMessage>

    public final class KMeansBSP
extends BSP<VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,VectorWritable,CenterMessage>
    K-Means in BSP that reads a bunch of vectors from input system and a given centroid path that contains initial centers.
